website_summaries.verdict: An entire Polly house that is affordable and quite comprehensive.
pros: Babysitting theme focuses on fun babysitting accessories as well as other cute details (trampoline, bike, etc.)
Included stickers allow children to customize play
Set folds up when not in use
cons: Some buyers state there are not as many details inside as previous Polly Pocket dollhouses

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, but not appropriate for recommended age group
customer_reviews.text: My four-year-old granddaughter loves this set and always wants to play with it when she comes to visit. The problem is that some of the pieces are so small that they're always getting lost and so playtime ends up in tears. Baby and pets are just too small for a four-year-old to handle. My granddaughter loves to play with them, but drops them and then we spend hours looking for them, sometimes to no avail. At the price of the kits, that's pretty disappointing. I don't recommend this for young children. Even if they weren't in scale with Polly and friends, I'd rather have larger pieces! So far we've bought three sets, but it's too expensive to replace missing pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to travel with
customer_reviews.text: Great toy to take with you just about anywhere. Be aware the pieces are very, very tiny. This little house simply folds up and off you go. The only thing in the design is the pieces are so very small they could simply fall out of the windows when traveling so we found a little drawstring bag to put all of the pieces into and it fits nicely inside of the house when folded up...surprised someone at the company didn't think of this. As far as value for the money, I think all of these Polly Pockets items are over priced.....but they can get it and the kids love it. My granddaughters play with it over and over again.
customer_reviews.author: Susan D.

customer_reviews.title: This is like the Barbie Dream House for Polly Pockets
customer_reviews.text: OMG this is absolutely adorable. All of the accessories are so perfect and cute. Of course there are some very tiny things like the dog for example. Just plan on getting a small little container of some sort I used a small little snack container to put the small pieces in when it's not being played with. This is such a great gift! My 4-year-old granddaughter absolutely loves playing with it. She likes having the container to put up the little pieces and she's kept up with everything including the miniscule dog and has played with it a lot. This is like the Barbie Dream House for Polly Pockets!
customer_reviews.author: Kelli C.

customer_reviews.title: Polly Pocket Pollyville House
customer_reviews.text: This would have been so much nice had one been able to not shred the cute "neighborhood" background that comes with the packaging, but in getting the toy out to use, the packaging had to be cut and ruined. The house itself is ok, coming with a lot of tiny parts which WILL be lost by any young child playing with this...Dangerous for kids under seven, I think.
customer_reviews.author: Tina the S.Top Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Cute idea, fun little brother and dog in set.
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute little house fun to play with. The trampoline is supposed to be bouncy doesn’t truly bounce just rubbery. Comes with cute little pieces. My eight year old loves the tiny dog and dog house and the baby brother. Now she is asking if they will make Polly’s parents for her. So she can have a family and not be alone. We do like this set a lot. She has 5 other polly sets for her polly village so far. Next she wants to get the mega mall.
customer_reviews.author: Keri

customer_reviews.title: Super cute but dolls not made well.
customer_reviews.text: 7yo daughter loves it! Easy to open, comes with adorable little accessories. The Polly pocket dolls are made out of a combo of hard plastic and rubber legs and feet. The rubber tears easily and we’ve already lost one of them due to a tear where the rubbery legs meet the hard plastic waist. Wish it was made out of the plastic with bendable waist like the old ones.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Hess

customer_reviews.title: Good little toy
customer_reviews.text: Nice toy. Polly's arm did come off after a few weeks, and it was not fixable wuth super glue, so now Polly is a paparplegic, which is has actually been good to teach our kid about differences in people. but it's a nice little toy set regardless. Little pieces are easily lost. Dog, baby, etc are smaller than a dime.
customer_reviews.author: Matt King

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: My 2 and 7 year old love this. The trampoline is especially cute because it is stretched rubber across the top and really bounces. The brown dog blends in with our carpet but has not been lost yet. Made a good xmas present.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift!
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect gift for a 6-year-old’s birthday. It doesn’t take up a lot of room, but is the perfect size for 1 or 2 girls to play with. It’s easy to transport to Grandma’s and easy to put away. Kids love miniature toys and these are perfect but not pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A.

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter loves this!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 5 year old granddaughter who loves this!!! Even my 3 y.o. grandson loves to play pretend with this House! It is great for travel as long as the house stays shut to contain the pieces inside.
customer_reviews.author: C. Zunker

customer_reviews.title: Cute and fun!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my six year old granddaughter for the holidays and she really loves it. Of course, the pieces are small, but we also got a little plastic pencil box to keep those in and out of her little brother's hands. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kelilah09

customer_reviews.title: Damaged box= UN- giftable. DISAPPOINTED with the lack if care it was packaged.
customer_reviews.text: It is upsetting when the box was delivered torn and damaged. It was bought as a gift and it does not look like something I would want to give as a gift. The outer box had no damage which leads me to believe whoever packaged this order saw the torn, ripped Polly Pocket toy and put it in anyway. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Nev

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!

Even in the structure there is not good place to keep all the tiny items and they get moved around (or lost) or a daily basis in our house. Would not recommend.

product_meta.title: Pollyville Pocket House
product_meta.description: Come hang out in Pollyville, the tiny hometown of Polly Pocket that's full of big surprises! There's no end to the fun and babysitting adventure at the Pocket House inspired by Polly's tiny hometown! This playset opens to reveal 4 stories, 5 rooms, 4 fun reveals, 11 accessories and includes micro Polly doll, little brother Paxton Pocket doll and Peaches the dog! Pocket House comes with many fun items for set up play: a rocking horse, Paxton Pocket doll's high chair, a table and 2 chairs, couch, Peaches' doghouse, a trampoline, and bike. Explore 4 floors of fun including: Polly's bedroom with laptop and closet; Paxton's room where Polly doll can put Paxton Pocket doll in his crib or they can play on the rocking horse; a bathroom with fun tub to get sudsy clean or a shower; and a living room to hang out and watch TV, table and chairs for eating, and stereo/music for dancing (stick Polly doll on the dance floor and it spins). There's also a kitchen to make food and a high chair so Polly doll can feed Paxton Pocket doll plus they can play outside, jump on the trampoline that really bounces and ride a bike – complete with baby seat for Paxton Pocket doll. Polly doll's feet fit into the bicycle pedals, and when the bike is pushed, the doll moves! Playset also includes a sticker sheet with Polly Stick technology that allows kids to stick the stickers anywhere and Polly doll and friends can stick on the sticker. Additional stickers like rugs, slippers and more add to the fun and let kids customize Pocket House. Includes Pollyville Pocket House, micro Polly and Paxton Pocket dolls, Peaches the dog, trampoline, bike and accessories. Create even more stories as you build out and customize your world with Pollyville tiny hangouts and vehicles! Collect them all! Each sold separately, subject to availability. Colors and decorations may vary. For ages 4 and up.
feature_bullets: Inspired by Polly's house in her tiny hometown of Pollyville, Pocket House features a babysitting theme and opens to reveal 4 stories, 5 rooms, 4 fun reveals, 11 accessories plus micro Polly and Paxton Pocket dolls and Peaches the dog.
Includes fun play pieces for set up: a rocking horse, Paxton's high chair, a table and 2 chairs, couch, Peaches' doghouse, a trampoline and bike.

House floors and activities include: Polly's bedroom; Paxton's room with crib and rocking horse; bathroom with a fun tub; a living room with TV, table and chairs, music/stereo for dancing (stick Polly doll on dance floor that spins); a kitchen and high chair so Polly doll can feed Paxton Pocket doll; and outside fun on the trampoline and bike riding.
Place Polly doll's feet in the bicycle pedals, push the bike, and the doll moves like she's riding the bike.
Sticker sheet with Polly Stick technology allows kids to stick the stickers anywhere and Polly doll and friends will can stick on the sticker.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,719 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
